thread.title: Azerbaijan newborn baby discovered bloodied in plastic bag by rubbish | Metro News
thread.title_full: Azerbaijan newborn baby discovered bloodied in plastic bag by rubbish | Metro News

author: Charles White
title: Azerbaijan newborn baby discovered bloodied in plastic bag by rubbish | Metro News
text:
Newborn baby found in a bloody plastic bag next to a rubbish bin Charles White Saturday 11 Feb 2017 3:27 pm The grim discovery was made by a passerby who videoed the moment (Pictures: CEN) 
A newborn baby girl has been discovered in a plastic bag dumped next to a rubbish bin. 
Discovered in Baku, Azerbaijan, the infant’s umbilical cord and the placenta were all in the carrier bag. 
Teen saves girl, 6, from burning car during riots over 'police truncheon rape' Just a few hours old, the blood-soaked girl was found alive in a ‘New Yorker’ bag by a passerby who videoed the moment. 
Left for dead, the girl was removed by the person who made the video. 
All wrapped up, the newborn can be seen moving her fingers before she was rushed to hospital. To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
A spokesman said: ‘She is alive. She had a course of treatment at the Republican Institute of Paediatrics and will be transferred to the baby clinic in the future.’ The newborn was found alive but bloodied and is currently in hospital (Pictures: CEN) 
Found in January, the grim video was put on social media before going viral. 
Authorities in the Eurasian city are now looking for the mother. More
